title: [GAMEPLAY] Jinx - Ambitious Elf Jinx sound bug

embed.description: League of Legends Ambitious Elf Jinx Skin Spotlight. Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Shows off Animations and Ability Effects of Jinx on their Ambitious Elf Skin in this Spotlight. All footage was taken in game.

body:
On Jinx, uniquely so on this skin, it plays the wrong sound effects when switching between minigun and rockets, notably they are switched. As a player who plays a LOT through sound I noticed this bug almost immediately. The first build of this skin that went out on the PBE had the sound effects correct, however in the video linked and on live, the skin has the sound effects switched. I'm fully aware that they have additional sound effects layered on top, but it plays the default sounds underneath for gameplay clarity.

1. Level up Q
2. Switch between rockets and mini gun.

Item purchases, levels, game time do not affect this bug, it occurs from beginning of the game until the nexus explodes.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! Looks like we've got a fix in the works. :)
